welcome_message: Welcome to WOARU - Your Universal Development Companion

errors.snyk_not_found: Snyk not found. Please install Snyk CLI for security analysis.
errors.api_key_missing: API key not found for provider {{provider}}

commands.analyze: Analyze project for code quality and security
commands.review: Review code changes and provide feedback

config.language_invalid: Invalid language: {{language}}. Supported languages: en, de

language_command.title: Language Selection
language_command.next_usage_note: The new language will be active in the next WOARU usage.

main.description: Universal Project Setup Autopilot - Analyze and automatically configure development tools for ANY programming language
main.purpose: Streamline your development workflow with intelligent tool recommendations

quick_analyze.description: Quick analysis for project setup recommendations
quick_analyze.purpose: Get instant recommendations for improving your project setup

setup.purpose: Configure development tools and AI providers for optimal workflow

setup_tools.purpose: Install and configure recommended tools based on your project type

ai.description: Manage AI providers for code analysis
ai.purpose: Configure and manage AI-powered code analysis capabilities

ai_setup.description: Setup and configure AI providers for code analysis
ai_setup.purpose: Add new AI providers and configure their settings

ai_legacy.description: Setup and configure AI providers for code analysis (alias for "woaru ai setup")
ai_legacy.purpose: Legacy command for AI provider configuration

llm.description: Setup and configure AI providers for code analysis (legacy alias for "woaru ai setup")

update_db.description: Update the tools database from remote source
update_db.purpose: Refresh the database of available development tools and configurations

watch.description: Start WOARU supervisor to continuously monitor the project
watch.purpose: Enable real-time monitoring and automated improvements for your project

status.description: Show WOARU supervisor status and project health
status.purpose: View current monitoring status and project health metrics

update.description: Updates WOARU to the latest version from npm
update.purpose: Keep WOARU up-to-date with the latest features and improvements

stop.purpose: Disable project monitoring and background processes

logs.purpose: View detailed logs from the WOARU supervisor

recommendations.purpose: Display personalized tool suggestions for your project

helpers.description: Show all detected/activated development tools and helpers
helpers.purpose: View all currently active development tools and configurations

docu.purpose: Generate comprehensive documentation for your codebase

docu_nopro.description: Generate human-friendly "Explain-for-humans" comments for non-technical audiences
docu_nopro.purpose: Create accessible documentation for stakeholders and non-developers (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

docu_pro.description: Generate technical TSDoc/JSDoc documentation for developers
docu_pro.purpose: Create detailed technical documentation following industry standards (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

docu_ai.description: Generate machine-readable YAML context headers optimized for AI comprehension
docu_ai.purpose: Create AI-optimized documentation for better code understanding (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

ignore.description: Add a tool to the ignore list
ignore.purpose: Exclude specific tools from recommendations and monitoring

review.purpose: Comprehensive code quality and security analysis

review_ai.description: AI-powered code review and analysis using multiple AI providers
review_ai.purpose: Get intelligent code insights using advanced AI analysis (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

review_git.description: Analyze changes since a specific branch (git diff)
review_git.purpose: Review changes in your git working directory

review_git_ai.description: AI-powered analysis of git changes using multiple AI providers
review_git_ai.purpose: Get intelligent insights on your code changes (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

review_local.description: Analyze current directory or specified path without git dependencies
review_local.purpose: Review code quality without requiring git integration

review_local_git.description: Analyze uncommitted changes in git working directory
review_local_git.purpose: Review your pending changes before committing

review_local_ai.description: AI-powered analysis of current directory using multiple AI providers
review_local_ai.purpose: Get AI-powered insights on your current codebase (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

review_path.purpose: Focus analysis on specific parts of your codebase

review_path_ai.description: AI-powered analysis of specific files or directories using multiple AI providers
review_path_ai.purpose: Get targeted AI analysis for specific code areas (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

analyze.description: Comprehensive project analysis including security audit
analyze.purpose: Perform deep analysis of your project's health and security

analyze_ai.description: AI-powered comprehensive code analysis using multiple AI providers
analyze_ai.purpose: Get intelligent comprehensive analysis of your entire project (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

rollback.description: Rollback changes made by a specific tool
rollback.purpose: Undo changes made by WOARU tools and configurations

commands.purpose: Browse all available WOARU commands with detailed explanations

wiki.description: Show comprehensive WOARU documentation and concept guide
wiki.purpose: Access complete documentation and learn WOARU concepts

message.description: Send reports from history to configured message channels
message.purpose: Share analysis reports via configured communication channels

message_all.description: Send all reports from .woaru/reports/ to configured channels
message_all.purpose: Share all historical reports via configured channels

message_latest.description: Send the latest report from .woaru/reports/ to configured channels
message_latest.purpose: Share the most recent analysis report

logs_main.description: View and manage WOARU activity logs
logs_main.purpose: Access and manage detailed activity logs

logs_clear.purpose: Remove all stored activity logs and start fresh

logs_stats.purpose: View statistics about WOARU usage and activities

version.purpose: Display current WOARU version and system information

check.purpose: Check if newer versions of WOARU are available

update_main.description: Update WOARU to the latest version
update_main.purpose: Upgrade to the latest version of WOARU

language.purpose: Change the language used by WOARU interface
